name: The Black Card Game
description:
Ever wanted to test your Blackness! The Black Card Card is a game that will test your skills and make sure that youre invited to the cookout.

This Black Trivia game have over 400 questions that are guaranteed to test your Black Card. From '90s to Black Movies, from Black TV Shows to Black History, this gaming experience is made for us.

- Hundreds of exciting questions
-You can add your own questions
-Prove how smart you are
-Learn something new about our Culture while having fun
-Make Your Black People Proud
